title: Giro d’Italia Stage 7: Tadej Pogačar Stuns Ganna, Explodes GC With Next-Level TT
content:
Pogačar blasts to 2:36 GC lead with sizzling ITT, Thomas slides to third after Martínez makes best time trial of his career.
